title: Maharashtra political crisis | Those who betrayed my ideology have no right to use my photo: Sharad Pawar
comments: I have a feeling that Pawars are playing the long con. Anyone remember how Fadnavis and Ajit Pawar almost formed a govt right after MH elections? I feel that too was a way to buy time for MVA+Shiv Sena alliance.
